column3: Raya–O–Senna wishes to congratulate you on your victory over Good King Moggle Mog XII.

Raya–O–Senna declares that your service on behalf of the Twelveswood shall not be forgotten. Certain that her sister would be glad to learn of Good King Moggle Mog XII's defeat from the <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> responsible, she advises you to return to the Lotus Stand in Old Gridania.

Your eloquent description of the events in Thornmarch serve to confirm the worst fears of the Elder Seedseer and your fellow Scions: like the primals summoned throughout Eorzea, Good King Moggle Mog XII was called forth through means imparted to the Mogglesguard by the Ascians. While he and Yda remain in Gridania to discuss the particulars of the Scion's compensation with the Elder Seedseer, Papalymo bids you return to the Waking Sands and report to Minfilia.

Minfilia is eager to hear your version of events, despite being well aware of your victory. Alas, she too is forced to conclude that Ascians were behind the king's appearance, both now and before. Though unfortunate, Minfilia acknowledges that the incident provided an opportunity to further demonstrate the necessity of the Scions and thus persuade the Elder Seedseer to proffer additional support─support which will only grow more valuable in the times ahead.
Speak with Kan–E–Senna at the Lotus Stand.
Report to Minfilia in the Waking Sands.
Your service on behalf of the Twelveswood and her moogles shall be remembered, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
My sister should be glad to learn of this victory from the <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> responsible. Pray return to the Lotus Stand and do so.
Do you not wish to inform my sister yourself? I should think it preferable to an impersonal linkpearl transmission.
The Elder Seedseer is expecting you, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>. May I show you in?
Kuplo Kopp says you killed the king! What happened, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>?
Based on Louisoix's notes, the king must surely have been a primal. But how...how can that be? It defies all precedent.
Everyone wants to hear your tale, kupo! What are you waiting for? Tell them!
We are glad of your safe return, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, and of your victory over Good King Moggle Mog XII.
However, many questions remain unanswered. I ask that you tell us, in detail, all that has transpired.
So...does this mean that the king is a primal?
But the moogles don't worship him; he's not a god to them. So he <Emphasis>can't</Emphasis> be primal, right?

Through the power of crystals and their collective faith, they called forth a being that does not exist. When felled, he left no corpse─the aether which comprised his form instead being scattered to the four winds.
In the strictest sense, he may not be a primal...but the method used to summon him was was the same.
Ascians! This reeks of their handiwork!
Kupopo!? T-They...they told me it was a masked man who had taught them how, years ago, but I never thought...
Confound it all! How many more will they tempt with their tainted gifts...
It may be our fate to face primal after primal─so long as the Paragons lurk within the shadows.
The information you have brought us has proven invaluable. The Grand Serpent Marshal and I have much to discuss.
Ah, if I may, Elder Seedseer─about what <Emphasis>we</Emphasis> discussed earlier...
As ever, the Scions have our utmost support. We would be more than willing to send additional supplies to Revenant's Toll.
We knew we could count on you!

While Yda and I remain to discuss the particulars of our arrangement with the Elder Seedseer, mayhap you could return to the Waking Sands first and report to the Antecedent, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>?
Thanks to the Elder Seedseer, the Rising Stones should be ready for us in no time!
The Antecedent should be pleased to learn of your triumph. Pray leave matters here to us and return to the Waking Stands.
You don't have to worry about the Mogglesguard anymore, kupo! The chieftain made them apologize to everyone in a great big ceremony. Just to be sure, we're keeping a close watch on them too.
We wish you a safe journey home, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>.
Please extend my personal thanks to the Antecedent, along with my fondest wishes for the Scion's successful relocation.

It is good to see you hale and healthy, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I received word from Yda and Papalymo that you had felled Good King Moggle Mog XII, but I had hoped to hear your version of the tale.
...So it was as they said. Summoned with the same methods used by the beast tribes and taught by the Ascians.
Though unfortunate, at least this incident helped us to persuade the Elder Seedseer to give us additional aid. Their support will be even more invaluable in the times ahead.
